data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw add_zero (a+b),
rw add_zero (b),
refl,
rw add_succ (a+b),
rw add_succ (b),
rw hk,
rw add_succ (a),
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw add_zero (a),
rw add_zero (succ a),
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm (c) (b),
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw mul_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rwa add_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_right_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rwa add_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_right_comm (a*k) a (b*(succ k)),
rw mul_succ,
rw add_assoc (a*k) (b*k+b) a,
rw add_assoc (b*k) b a,
rw add_assoc,
rwa add_comm a b,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rwa zero_mul,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rwa hk,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw hk,
rwa mul_comm a b,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText: rwa pow_zero,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rwa mul_zero,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rwa one_mul,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rwa pow_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw hk,
rwa mul_one,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rwa mul_one,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hk,
rw pow_succ,
simp,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rwa mul_one,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw hk,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm a b,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ k) a (b ^ k * b),
rw mul_comm a (b ^ k * b),
rwa mul_assoc,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw pow_add,
rwa hk,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
rw add_mul,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
rw add_mul,
rw mul_comm a b,
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro w,
intro p,
have j : Q → R := k p,
have q : Q := w p,
apply j,
exact q,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro j,
intro h,
have q := k(h),
apply j,
exact q,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro j,
intro p,
apply j,
apply k,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have w := j(q),
have x := l(w),
exact x,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have w := j(q),
have x := l(w),
exact x,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro w,
intro p,
have q := w(p),
apply k,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro j,
intro p,
apply j,
apply k,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro k,
intro q,
intro p,
have w := k(p),
have j := q(w),
exact j,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText: cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro k,
cases h with p q,
cases k with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro k,
cases h with j t,
cases k with w i,
split,
intro p,
have q := j(p),
have r := w(q),
exact r,
intro r',
have q' := i(r'),
have p' := t(q'),
exact p',

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro k,
cases h with j t,
cases k with w i,
split,
intro p,
have q := j(p),
have r := w(q),
exact r,
intro r',
have q' := i(r'),
have p' := t(q'),
exact p',

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro pqr,
cases pqr with p qr,
cases qr with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro pqpr,
cases pqpr with pq pr,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact p,
left,
exact q,
cases pr with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p notp,
have boom := notp(p),
exfalso,
exact boom,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
exact hs,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rwa h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with k hk,
rw add_zero at h,
rwa add_zero at h,
rw add_succ at h,
rw add_succ at h,
apply hk,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm,
rw add_comm t b,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel _ _ _ ,
intro h,
rwa h,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction a with k hk,
intro h,
rw zero_add at h,
exact h,
intro i,
rw succ_add at i,
apply hk,
apply succ_inj,
exact i,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ at H,
have hc := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
contradiction,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a with d,
intro h,
refl,
intro h,
rw succ_add at h,
have hc := succ_ne_zero (d + b),
contradiction,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
induction d with k hk,
rw zero_add,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
exact zero_ne_succ 0,
intro h,
have i := succ_inj h,
contradiction,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro x,
intro y,
intro ab,
induction b with n hn,
rw mul_zero at ab,
contradiction,
rw mul_succ at ab,
have k := add_left_eq_zero(ab),
contradiction,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b,
rw mul_zero at h,
right,
exact h,
rw mul_succ at h,
left,
have k := add_left_eq_zero(h),
exact k,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
have w:= eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
exact w,
intro aoub,
cases aoub,
rw aoub,
rwa zero_mul,
rw aoub,
rwa mul_zero,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
intro k,
rw mul_zero at k,
have w:= eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
have q:= w(k),
cases q,
contradiction,
exact q,
intro i,
cases b,
rw mul_zero at i,
exfalso,
apply ha,
symmetry at i,
cases (eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero _ _ i) with x y,
exact x,
exfalso,
apply succ_ne_zero,
exact y,
have p:= hd(d),
rw mul_succ at i, 
rw mul_succ at i,
have adrc:= add_right_cancel (a * b) a (a * d),
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
have t := adrc(i),
apply hd,
exact t,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
exact add_comm 1 x,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 0,
rwa add_zero,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw le_iff_exists_add at h ⊢,
cases h with c hc,
use succ c,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use a,
rwa zero_add,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry
